JOB DESCRIPTION: The person is expected to have: B.Tech/M. Tech in CS/EE from a reputed institute. 2-5 years of experience in designing, developing and maintaining large EDA software.  Sound knowledge in data structures, graph algorithms and C/C++ programming on Windows/Unix. Familiarity with Verilog and VHDL HDL/RTL languages. Familiarity with parsing, elaboration techniques, control and data flows, logic synthesis. Working knowledge of FPGA design tools and flows is a plus.

EDUCATION.DOCTORATE: Doctorate Not Required, Any Doctorate in Any Specialization
